ParaphGenesis.txt: Hi I'm Jeremy, a self taught webdesigner & developer.
I practise single-page application development with the lastest frameworks the web as to offer and use my years of experience as a web and motion designer to make things beautiful and alive.
Actually focusing my studies on ReactJS the popular library from Facebook. React render components dynamically with high performances.
I tend to not limit my learnings to one specific job and extend my knowledge from front to back-end.
I ultimately want to provide immersive and meaningful web experiences, both beautiful and effective.

Content.Title: React
Content.Desc: Popular view library from Facebook to create interfaces.

Content.Desc: State management library for React and others view library

Content.Desc: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

Content.Desc: One of the fastest 2D WebGL renderer.

Content.Desc: Greensock framework provide fast and smooth animations for the web
